Introduction: I'm Mona! It's nice to meet you.$h#$e#You chose a good time to move here.... Spring is lovely.
Resort_Entering: Don't tell anyone, but Willy let me steer the boat for a few minutes.$h
Resort: I love the weather in Stardew Valley, but seeing a different climate now and then helps put things into perspective.
Resort_Shore: The shape of the waves here is awe inspiring.#$e#I wonder if I could ever capture that sort of formlessness in a sculpture.
Resort_Chair: I like the heat as long as I'm keeping perfectly still.$h
Resort_Wander: Mmm, I bet the trees around here would make for an interesting medium to work with.#$e#Though Willy probably wouldn't be happy with me if I dragged a bunch of logs onto his ship!$h
Resort_Wander_2: I wonder what kind of things you could forage out here.#$e#I think I saw some tasty looking walnuts growing on a bush nearby.
Resort_Bar: Have you tried the Pi√±a Colada? I'm on my second one... hehe.
danceRejection: I'll be honest. I don't want to dance with you.$u
divorced: I've realized I'm happier by myself. So just leave me be.$u
breakUp: Ohh... Got it. Hah... I really don't have any luck when it comes to this stuff...$s
dumped_Girls: I don't want to see you for a while...$s
secondChance_Girls: You caused a lot of grief with what you did... but I'm ready to put the past behind us.$s
Beach: I came for the sound of the ocean. Beautiful, isn't it?
spring_1: Ah yes, spring, the perfect time to start something new.#$e#I should spend some time in the library reading about the flora and fauna.
Mon: The trees look beautiful today, don't they?#$q 21/22/211132 Mon_old#Why did you become a farmer anyway?#$r 21 -5 Mon_21#I want to make heaps of money.#$r 22 5 Mon_22#It's more 'real' than a life in the city.#$r 211132 5 Mon_211132#To follow in my grandfather's footsteps.#$r 22 5 Mon_22#I wanted to escape from my old life.
Mon_old: $p 21#So you're making as much money as you hoped?|spending time in nature can be very fulfilling.
Mon_21: Hmm. That's a bit superficial, isn't it?$s
Mon_22: That's pretty much the same reason I came here too!$h
Mon_211132: It's very cute how you honor your grandfather.
Tue4: A warm cup of coffee and a good book, the best way to start the day!#$e#What is your favorite way to start the day?
Tue: Hello, neighbor.#$e#We both live out of town. Does that mean anything?
Wed: It's fascinating how nature wakes up these times. I should document this change in my journal.
Wed6: I love being around animals. They are so innocent.#$e#I wonder how Woo is doing?$h
Wed8: Hi @! I was just thinking about you and your farm.#$e#I was imagining how good it must feel to harvest a lot of plants.$h#$e#Wouldn't it be nice to have a little help though?$l
Thu: There really are a lot of wild plants in this area if you know where to look.#$e#I treat myself to a fresh salad almost every day.$h
Thu6: Gathering is a specialty of mine. Someday I'll make you a fresh salad.$h
Fri: I've heard that goats are especially productive in the spring.#$e#Their milk creates the creamiest cheese. Maybe I should try making it myself.#$e#Do you have a goat I could get some fresh milk from?.$h
Fri4: Hello, @. It's a nice day, isn't it?#$e#Why don't you stop by my cabin if you need someone to talk to.$h
Sat: I really appreciate the taste of coffee and cheese.#$e#What would happen if I combined those two flavors?$7#$e# No, I don't think that's a good idea.$s#$e#But... one could try, right?$h
Sat8: Farm life sounds like it could be fun. I'd like to try it sometime too.$l
Sun: Have you read any interesting books lately?#$e#I always like to take book recommendations.$h
event_sculpt2: There's nothing wrong with that... I think there's lots of beauty to be found in raw, untouched nature!#$b#But as a human, I'm also interested in how we shape and interpret the world around us... I guess what I'm saying is that I'm interested in 'art'.
event_sculpt3: You pig!%fork$a^Oh! You're...? Me too.$6#$b#Get out!$a^That's good to know.$l
event_parents1: You're right... I just wouldn't have been happy back there.$u#$b#It was better for both of us... to end an unsustainable relationship while we were still young and flexible.$u
event_parents2: That's a little harsh... but, yeah. We had different priorities.$u
event_parents3: Oh yeah? Well maybe I'll just leave, then!%fork$a
event_parents4: *sigh*...$s#$b#I guess you're right... it was kind of selfish. But can you really blame me for wanting to be happy? Ugh... I don't know...$s
event_parents5: *sigh*...$s#$b#Maybe you're right... Humans are selfish creatures. I don't know. $s#$b#I probably shouldn't dwell on it. We all have to make hard choices from time to time.$s
summer_1: Summer is here! The time when I can enjoy as much iced coffee as I want without feeling guilty.#$e#It's the little things in life, you know?$h
summer_Mon: I found some wild fruit this morning!#$e#Sorry, I don't have any left.$s#$e#Keep looking around, I'm sure you'll find something.
summer_Tue: Reading a book on the beach is just so relaxing. I have some novels I've been saving for just this moment#$e#How about you?$h
summer_Tue4: The simple things in life are the best: a good coffee, an exciting book and a relaxing stream.
summer_Thu6: I have a good eye for wild fruit. Someday I'll make you a nice fruit salad.$h
summer_Fri: You can put coffee beans in a barrel to make delicious coffee.#$e#It takes a little time, but it's worth it.
summer_Fri6: Hello, @. Do you ever get lonely on the farm?#$e#Just stop by my cabin if you need someone to talk to.$h
summer_Sat: Sometimes it feels like there is so much left to discover in the world. Books help you understand all the more things about it.
summer_Sun: What should I do on such a warm, lazy day? *sigh*#$e#Any ideas?
fall_1: How quickly the seasons change!#$e#It's shocking.
fall_Mon: The changing colors of autumn are so inspiring. I wonder if I should start writing my own book.
fall_Tue: A warm cup of coffee and a cozy sweater, this is my ideal outfit to feel really cozy.
fall_Wed: It's so nice to live by the river.#$e#I fall asleep every night with the soothing murmur of the water.
fall_Fri: Autumn, the time for spooky content, but with me you can be sure I won't touch any horror games!
fall_Fri6: Stop by my cabin if you need someone to talk to.$h
fall_Sat: You know, legends say that owls like me are messengers of wisdom. Maybe that's why I feel so connected to books and their wisdom.
fall_Sun: There are a lot of good places to walk around here.#$e#It feels good to stretch your legs.$h
winter_Mon: I love the sight of everything covered in a blanket of snow.
winter_Tue: It gets pretty cold in my cabin.$s#$e#I just snuggle under a huge blanket and all is well.$h
winter_Wed: I saw a snow bunny this morning! They're rare, aren't they?
winter_Thu: I find joy in reading a book on long winter nights, there is just something magical about reading books by candlelight.
winter_Fri: Brrr, The winter is cold! If only I could go into hibernation like a real owl... I guess I'll just have to settle for a blanket and hot cocoa.$s
winter_Fri6: Do you ever actually get cold in your farmhouse?#$e#Please stop by my cabin if you want to slip under one of my down comforters and drink coffee.$h
winter_Sat: Winter is the time for self-reflection! I often find myself re-reading my favorite books during these cold winter months, snuggled up in a blanket.
winter_Sun: Do you ever take a day off?#$e#To regain your strength.$h
